name: Of Light & Shadow
storyline: Master the Lights! Of Light & Shadow is a puzzle-platformer with a “light” twist, combining two areas in each level, light, and shadow, as well as two protagonists in one playable character, Dr. Shadow and Mr. Light. While either of them can only survive in either light or shadow areas, the player must constantly switch between them and make the right decision about whose abilities to utilize.
summary:
Of Light & Shadow is an award winning sidescrolling puzzle platformer for PC and Mac released under CC BY-NC-ND. The game combines two areas in each level, light and shadow, as well as two protagonists in one playable character, Mr. Light and Dr. Shadow. While either can only survive in light or shadow areas respectively, the player has to constantly switch between them and make the right decision about whose abilities to utilise.

Of Light & Shadow was achieved as a final project at the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences by a team of students called 12 Angry Devs.
